ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Something I've noticed:
ygData.msgSnippet: I m curious as to whether on ANY server people don t log to clear the hate list in Fear and Hate.... and to what the tactic would be... is it just to kill them
ygData.messageBody:
I'm curious as to whether on ANY server people don't log to clear the hate
list in Fear and Hate.... and to what the tactic would be... is it just to
kill them as fast as you can while your party members drop off one by one?

Halana 52nd forever Shaman
Tani 23rd Bard
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Monday, June 05, 2000 12:04 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Something I've noticed:


I'm not sure how the GMs can even say that logging is something they don't
like --
its the usual tactic in Hate, Fear, etc. The PROBLEM with logging is 1) it
takes
forever and 2) Then you have to wait for te whole group to log off, log bck
on,
reform, etc. ITs a really big hassle that I would avoid in most
circumstances

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 28 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
Jidranth, lvl 8 Iskar Warrior, Solusek Ro, Phoenix /

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
>Sent: Monday, June 05, 2000 7:11 AM

>In Kunark if you use AE Fear you can actually fear the mobs so far
>away that they don't come back. FUN method of crowd control if a
>pull gets out of hand. Snare what you're fighting then fire off
>Fear. Everything else runs away at mach speed and usually doesn't
>come back because it runs outside it's chase radius.
>
>Haven't used it much because I'm waiting word from a GM on whether
>it's legal (I suspect he'll say it's fine as long as you don't
>relog to clear the hate list. Could be an awesome tool for
>zoneline fighting though ;)
>
>Lyrnia Jongleur
>Bard of Norrath
